ing: 1 (6 ounce) can pitted black olives, drained and chopped
1 (4.5 ounce) can mushrooms, drained and chopped
des: "I got this recipe from my sister-in-law. Make this one day in advance and serve with whole wheat crackers."
ins:
Mix together the cream cheese, olives, mushrooms, green onions, dried beef and monosodium glutamate.
Form into a ball and roll in the pecans. Refrigerate over night before serving.
